definition: Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)

sentences.english: Marking of Word Class in A New Century Chinese-English Dictionary;
sentences.chinese: 汉语四字成语是汉英词典中不可或缺的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: In Chinglish City you can get a ChineseEnglish email address. Register now.

sentences.english: Chinese four-character idioms are a special yet important component of a Chinese-English dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 汉语四字成语是汉英词典中不可或缺的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: Therefore, a contrastive study on cultural connotations of basic color words between Chinese and English is of much importance.
sentences.chinese: 因此研究汉英基本颜色词的文化内涵具有一定的意义。

sentences.english: They are compiling a Chinese English dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 我的字典是一本汉英词典。

sentences.english: The relativity of hypotaxis and parataxis is also discussed in this chapter.
sentences.chinese: 第三章讨论形合和意合在英汉和汉英翻译中的应用。

sentences.english: A trend of male-centered thinking is revealed in Chinese and English Advertising language.
sentences.chinese: 汉英广告词中对男权文化有着深层次的反映。

sentences.english: I have bought a Chinese-English dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 我带来了一本汉英字典。

sentences.english: Each of us has a Chinese-English dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 我们每人都有一本汉英词典。

sentences.english: I'd like to buy a Chinese-English dictionary.
I think he should borrow a Chese English dictionary from his classmate.
sentences.chinese: 我想他应该向他的同学借本汉英词典。

sentences.english: This Chinese-English dictionary is designed for foreign students.
sentences.chinese: 这本汉英词典专供外国学生使用的。
他买到了一本汉英词典。

sentences.english: Many thanks for a copy of "The Chinese-English Dictionary".
sentences.chinese: 承蒙惠赠＜汉英词典＞，甚为感谢。
